required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Community With Immigrants - a Step on the Road to Employment
clinical_study.official_title: Community With Immigrants - a Step on the Road to Employment

brief_summary.textblock: The study will investigate if a standard integration programme in combination with a social and health promoting intervention can increase health and well-being among refugee families and influence success with education and employment.

detailed_description.textblock:
Increased health and well-being can lead to stronger motivation and ability to get involved in education or employment and thereby improve integration of refugee families.
The aim of the study is to investigate the effect of various social and health promoting activities such as physical activity workshops, community gardening, entrepreneurship training, MindSpring course, family excursions and language education on health, well-being, social relations and success with job and education. Increased success with self-sufficiency can support action competence and play a key role in the integration process. Outcome measures are based on self-reporting, biological measures and municipal registry data.

primary_outcome.measure: The Warwick-Edinburgh Mental Well-Being Scale - 7 items (WEMWBS)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline to 12 months and 24 months
primary_outcome.description: WEMWBS is a validated measure of mental well-being and contains seven questions (a shortened version of the WEMWBS - 14 items). The scoring range for each item is from 1- 5, and the total score is from 7-35. The seven items have superior scaling properties to the 14 items, and mean raw scores are therefore transformed to metric scores using a standard conversion table.

primary_outcome.measure: Mean change from baseline in self-reported health
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline to 12 months and 24 months
primary_outcome.description: General health is assessed based on a question on self-reported health in the SF-12 questionnaire (a 12-Item short form health survey). SF 12 is a short version of the generic questionnaire SF 36 that measures health-related quality of life in the past four weeks. Scoring range is between 1-5 points. Mean score is calculated at baseline, 12 months and 24 months.

primary_outcome.measure: Mean change from baseline in cortisol, nmol/L
Mean change from baseline in blood sugar (HBA1C), mmol/mol
primary_outcome.description: Blood sugar measured in venous blood

primary_outcome.measure: Mean change from baseline in total cholesterol, mmol/L
primary_outcome.description: Total cholesterol measured in venous blood

primary_outcome.measure: Mean change from baseline in self-reported social relations
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline to 12 months and 24 months
primary_outcome.description: Social relations are assessed based on five questions from the National Health Profile Survey (used in the Danish National Health Survey) in combination with one self-formulated question regarding contact with family members, friends, colleagues, neighbors and friends from social medias. Scoring range is between 1-5 points. Mean score is calculated at baseline, 12 months and 24 months.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline to 12 months and 24 months
primary_outcome.description: From unemployed to employed; from not being involved in education to being involved in education. Data from municipal registers.

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean change from baseline in Dihydepiandrosteron-sulfate (DHEAS), µmol/L
Mean change from baseline in interleukin-6 (IL-6), ng/L
Mean change from baseline in C-reactive protein (CRP), nmol/L
Mean change from baseline in fibrinogen (FIBR), g/L
Mean change from baseline in weight
secondary_outcome.description: Weight (in kilograms). Weight is measured in kilograms

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean change from baseline in BMI
secondary_outcome.description: Weight and height (measured in meters) will be combined to report BMI in kg/meters2

secondary_outcome.measure: Mean change from baseline in blood pressure
secondary_outcome.description: Systolic and diastolic blood pressure (mmHg) will be measured using the Omron M3 blood pressure monitor.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Standard integration program with social and health promoting intervention
arm_group.description: Participants follow the standard integration program offered by Naestved Municipality and participate in various social and health promoting activities in addition
Participants follow the standard integration program offered by Naestved Municipality

intervention.intervention_name: Standard integration program with social and health promoting intervention
intervention.description: Basic language course, internships, courses in Labour market knowledge and Danish culture Physical activity workshops Community gardening (garden workshops) Entrepreneurship course MindSpring course Family excursions Danish language workshops
intervention.arm_group_label: Standard integration program with social and health promoting intervention

intervention.description: Standard integration program (basic language course, internships, courses in Labour market knowledge and Danish culture)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adult refugees aged 18 years and above
- Young refugees aged 13 -17 years
- Must have obtained Danish asylum and live in Naestved Municipality
Exclusion Criteria:
- Physical and/or mental illness which prevents the individual from participating in the integration program offered by Naestved Municipality
- Illness which does not allow collection of a venous blood sample and saliva sample.
